summary: Georgia is a country in Eastern Europe and West Asia, located in the Caucasus region. It has a long history, dating back to prehistoric times, and is known for being one of the earliest wine-making regions. The country has faced many changes, including rule by various empires and a period as a Soviet republic. Georgia gained independence in 1991 and has since worked towards democracy and joining the EU and NATO. It has a unique culture and is home to stunning landscapes and ancient monuments. Georgia's capital, Tbilisi, is the largest city and home to many of its 3.7 million residents.
title: Georgia (country)
